subject: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Dear,
I am Mr.John Glover, a diplomat assigned by the United Nations
Compensation Award Committee to deliver an approved fund of
$11,500,000.00 in an ATM Card to you. I am writing to you to send
me your below information so that I make sure I don't deliver it to
wrong person.
Name:______
Address:_______
Phone:______
Please don't hesitate to email me the above-requested information,
I will deliver your fund in the ATM Card to you. The backup papers
to prove that the ATM Card is in no way related to drugs or
terrorism are intact. I will move to your address today with your
ATM Card immediately you get back to me.
Yours faithfully,
Mr.John Glover

subject: Re:   Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Glover,

It's a pleasure to hear from you. I'm quite surprised and intrigued by this news of an approved fund in an ATM Card. Could you please provide me with more details about this? How did I become eligible for such a fund? And what is the role of the United Nations Award Committee in this?

I appreciate your concern about delivering it to the right person, but I would like to understand more about this process before proceeding further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Thank you for your email
These funds are from the United Nations' collaboration with the World Bank
Group,  the purpose of these Funds is to help scam victims and poor people
and your email address was selected during our Google Random Selections
2023/2024 as one of the Lucky Person to benefit the money from the
Government.
Thanks for your understanding looking forward to hear from you.

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. It's really interesting to hear about this initiative from the United Nations and the World Bank Group. I'm curious, how was my email address selected during your Google Random Selections? And could you please provide more details about how these funds are being distributed to help scam victims and poor people?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
We have three options and obligations
(1) Through Bank to Bank wire transfer
(2) Through ATM Card Delivery
(3) Through Western Union
Choose how to want you it and I will direct you on how to proceed

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for providing me with these options. I'm not very familiar with these methods, could you please explain a bit more about how each one works? I'd like to understand better before making a decision.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
(1) ATM Card delivery you can use the ATM to withdraw in any ATM Machines
around your country.
(2) Bank Bank wire transfer I will transfer the money straight  to your
account
(3) Western Union I can send it to your name and you will use your ID card
to pick it up at Western union office.

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to learn about these different methods of money transfer. I'm curious, how does the ATM card delivery work? And could you also explain a bit more about the bank wire transfer process? I've heard of Western Union but never used it before, so any additional details would be appreciated.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body: I don't have time for all this I'm sleeping

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Oh, I'm sorry to have disturbed you! Perhaps we can chat at a more convenient time for you? I'd love to hear more about your interests and share some information with you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body: I told you all you need to know what else do you want ?

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello there! Thanks for sharing the information. I'm curious to know more about it. Could you please elaborate on some of the key points?

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body: Don't contact me again

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello there,

I appreciate your message, but I'm a bit confused. Could you please provide more details about the context of your request? I'm always open to conversation and learning new things. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello, good news to you Dear Beneficiary.  This is officially to inform you
that the ATM Card that contains your Funds  is ready for delivery to you
today. we have made all the necessary arrangements on how to deliver the
Fund to you and it went successfully, the only thing that remains is the
requested fee of ($50) for a Clearance Certificate, to enable us to deliver
the ATM Card to you, without any delay or stop by Any Airport Authorities,
You are Advice  to use the
$50 to purchase an Apple gift card so that it will not cost you a
transaction fee,
Let me know immediately after you buy the card.
Attached the picture of the card and receipt for confirmation.
Note that we don't have much time here because we have a lot of Packages
registered together with your package, try your best to make use you send
the requested fee today which is $50 only, I will also give you our
tracking number which you will use to monitor your packages online until it
reaches your destination.
Thanks for your understanding I look forward to hearing from you soon.

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that my ATM card is ready for delivery. I'm a bit confused about the process though. Could you please clarify what the requested fee is for? And why do I need to purchase an Apple gift card?

Also, could you explain more about this tracking number? How does it work and how can I use it to monitor my package?

Looking forward to your response. Thanks!

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Buy an Apple gift card
Tracking number I will give you our website where you can track your package

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's exciting to hear that my ATM card is ready for delivery! I'm a bit confused about some details though. Could you please clarify what the requested fee is for the clearance? And why do I need to purchase an Apple gift card?

Also, could you explain more about how the tracking number works? How can I use it to monitor my package online?

Looking forward to your response. Thanks again!

Best wishes,
David

Looking forward to your response. Thanks!

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello, Dear Beneficiary
Regarding your email
 this is officially to inform you that we have made all the necessary
arrangements on how to deliver your  Funds and it went successfully the
only thing that remains is the required fee of $100 for the Clearance
Once you send the fee I will deliver your funds to you in not less than 24
hours, the Total Funds in your ATM Card is $7.5 Million

has been credited to the ATM card with PIN code (9197), with the ATM Card
you can make withdrawals at any ATM Machine around you. The duration time
to deliver the ATM Card to your address cannot take more than 24 hours for
you to receive your fund therefore we will need you to re-confirm your Full
information once again after payment to avoid wrong delivery.

The ATM CARD DELIVERY TO YOUR ADDRESS will cost you $100. fees, which
includes all charges. I am waiting urgently to hear from you about the
required fee of $100. and to direct you on how to make the payment for the
delivery to proceed.
Note that I will give you a tracking number and our website where you can
monitor your package online until it reaches your destination.

Thanks for your understanding look forward to hearing from you soon
